question: What is the "head tax"?
possible_answers: A. Race-based entry fee charged for Chinese entering Canada
B. Fee charged for anyone entering Canada after 1900
C. A tax imposed on beer beginning in 1867
D. Fee charged for moving westward in the early 1900s
answer: A. Race-based entry fee charged for Chinese entering Canada
explanatory_sentence: Afterwards the Chinese were subject to discrimination, including the Head Tax, a race-based entry fee.
